headline: Is Realty Income Still a Bargain After Recent Acquisition Headlines in 2025?
summary: Curious if Realty Income stock is a bargain right now? You are not alone in wanting to know whether this popular real estate investment can still deliver value. Despite a 9.2% gain year-to-date and a steady 8.5% return over the last year, Realty Income’s price has seen some minor swings. The stock has ticked up 1.3% in the past week but dipped slightly by 0.9% in the last month. Much of this recent movement has been driven by shifts in the broader real estate sector and interest rate...
